free.jin
Class User

java.lang.Object
  free.jin.User

public class User
extends java.lang.Object

A holder for the user's settings and preferences. Throughout the documentation (unless I forgot/mistyped), the actual user is referred to as "user" (lowercase 'u') and a User object is referred to as "User" (uppercase 'u').

Method Summary
 MemoryFile getFile(java.lang.String name)
          Returns a MemoryFile with the specified name.
 java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName)
          Returns the value of the property of the user with the given name or null if the user has no property with the given name.
 java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String defaultValue)
          Returns the value of the property of the user with the given name or the given default value if the user has no property with the given name.
 Server getServer()
          Returns the Server object represeting the serverthis user logs on to.
 java.lang.String getUsername()
          Returns the username of this user - the value of the "login.username" property.
 boolean isGuest()
          Returns true if this user is the global guest account.
 MemoryFile putFile(java.lang.String name, MemoryFile file)
          Adds the specified MemoryFile to this User's files under the specified name.
 void setProperty(java.lang.String propertyName, java.lang.String propertyValue)
          Sets this user's property with the given name to the given value, or, if the specified property value is null, removes the property.
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a textual representation of the user.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getFile

public MemoryFile getFile(java.lang.String name)
Returns a MemoryFile with the specified name. Returns null if no MemoryFile with the specified name exists.

putFile

public MemoryFile putFile(java.lang.String name,
                          MemoryFile file)
Adds the specified MemoryFile to this User's files under the specified name. If a MemoryFile under the specified name already exists, it is removed and returned by this method.

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName)
Returns the value of the property of the user with the given name or null if the user has no property with the given name.

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
                                    java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns the value of the property of the user with the given name or the given default value if the user has no property with the given name.

getUsername

public java.lang.String getUsername()
Returns the username of this user - the value of the "login.username" property.

setProperty

public void setProperty(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
Sets this user's property with the given name to the given value, or, if the specified property value is null, removes the property.

Parameters:
propertyName - The name of the property.
propertyValue - The new value of the property.

getServer

public Server getServer()
Returns the Server object represeting the serverthis user logs on to.

isGuest

public boolean isGuest()
Returns true if this user is the global guest account.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a textual representation of the user.
